TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocumentWriter extends System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter

summary.span: 提供寫入 XPS 文件或列印佇列的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有沒有建構函式。 has no constructor. 若要建立，使用靜態方法類別，或使用其中一個靜態方法類別。To create an , use the static method of the class or use one of the static methods of the class. 在文件或建立佇列成為它所寫入的目標。The document or the queue that creates the becomes the target to which it writes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立 類別的執行個體。The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[XpsSave#CreateXpsDocumentWriter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpsSaveHelper.cs#createxpsdocumentwriter)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#CreateXpsDocumentWriter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpssavehelper.vb#createxpsdocumentwriter)]

override this.Write : string -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: 來源文件的路徑。

span.span: The path of the source document.

summary.span: 以同步方式將指定的 XPS 文件寫入目標或。

span.span: Synchronously writes a specified XPS document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然類別具有單一的名稱，可以是其中一個或一組多份文件。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 這個方法會加入的一組來源中的項目目標中的項目或。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 這`Write`方法將 reserialize 指定的 XPS 文件，這將會移除所有的內容，從，並不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-388.htm)。This `Write` method will reserialize the specified XPS document, which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-388.htm). 雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組從標記，包括任何擴充 XPS 內容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended XPS content. 根據設計，這`Write`方法不會引發事件。By design, this `Write` method does not raise the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Write (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void Write(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub Write (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void Write(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.Write : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: 來源文件的路徑。

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: 指出是否啟用通知。

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: 以同步方式將指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文件寫入目標 或 。

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`notificationLevel`停用，則複製序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]目標文件或建立。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . 當`notificationLevel`啟用時，先還原序列化文件，接下來這，然後將它寫入進度通知的目標為每個頁面都是輸出。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 雖然類別具有單一的名稱，可以是其中一個或一組多份文件。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 這個方法會加入來源序列中的項目目標中的項目或。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果`notificationLevel`指定為，只有在序列化文件時，不會列印時產生通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收通知必須 reserialized 文件。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 當 reserialized 文件是所有內容從，不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)會移除。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. 雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組，從標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]內容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果`notificationLevel`指定為不 reserialized 文件和任何擴充的內容會保留，即使在列印時。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 依設計這方法不會呼叫事件。By design this method does not call the event.

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然類別具有單一的名稱，可以是其中一個或一組多份文件。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 這個方法會加入的一組來源中的項目目標中的項目或。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 這方法將 reserialize 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]這將會移除所有內容的文件，並不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。This method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組，從標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]內容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 依設計這方法不會呼叫事件。By design this method does not call the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteAsync (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void WriteAsync(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub WriteAsync (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void WriteAsync(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.WriteAsync : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: 來源文件的路徑。

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: 指出是否啟用通知。

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: 以非同步方式，將指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文件連同通知選項一起寫入目標 或 。

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`notificationLevel`停用，則複製序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]目標文件或建立。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . 當`notificationLevel`啟用時，先還原序列化文件，接下來這，然後將它寫入進度通知的目標為每個頁面都是輸出。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 雖然類別具有單一的名稱，可以是其中一個或一組多份文件。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 這個方法會加入來源序列中的項目目標中的項目或。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果`notificationLevel`指定為，只有在序列化文件時，不會列印時產生通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收通知必須 reserialized 文件。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 當 reserialized 文件是所有內容從，不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)會移除。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. 雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組，從標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]內容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果`notificationLevel`指定為不 reserialized 文件和任何擴充的內容會保留，即使在列印時。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 依設計這方法不會呼叫事件。By design this method does not call the event.
